digest: Merge stereo textures into one anaglyph texture

description.desc1: The TextureAnaglyph node takes two input textures, usually a stereo pair, and merges them into a anaglyph texture
description.desc2: The TextureAnaglyph node can be either applied as a shader to a 3d object or a ViewPort node, or used as an explicit texture renderpass to create the anaglyph texture.

Feedback.feedback1: Documentations take a lot of time and effort. Unfortunately both are scarce ressources.
Feedback.feedback2: If you would like to have more info about this node please drop a note. It helps to set priorities according to the user needs...
